main event: In November 1956, two oblong objects that were the size of basketballs and brilliant white in color with four yellow lights on each were reported stationary and high in the sky over East Gary, Indiana.
interesting points: The sighting involved two objects that were observed to be stationary and very high in the sky.,The objects were described as brilliant white with four yellow lights on each.,The witnesses did not complete reports for evaluation.,There were various conclusions with insufficient data to determine the nature of the objects.,Potential explanations included it being a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomenon.
sighted object: two oblong objects the size of basketballs with four yellow lights
